head.title: Does a Missile Shield Make Sense?

hedline.hl1: Does a Missile Shield Make Sense?

abstract.p: Isaac Cohen letter calls for independent inquiry about feasibility of effective missile defense system (S)

block.p: Frances FitzGerald (Op-Ed, June 4) suggests that President Clinton's missile defense proposal, a mini-version of President Ronald Reagan's ''Star Wars'' program, has been a political ploy. We should flood our representatives, many still with some integrity, to urge Congress to conduct an independent inquiry about the feasibility of an effective missile defense system.
If the gullibility of the taxpayer has been manipulated by unscrupulous politicians of all sides, our voice should be raised: enough is enough. ISAAC COHEN Wilmette, Ill., June 4, 2000
